waxed_workstations.midnightconfig.title: Waxed Workstations Config
waxed_workstations.midnightconfig.enable: Enable waxing modded and vanilla villager workstations. Waxed workstations can't be claimed by villagers.
Enable waxing modded and vanilla beds. Waxed beds can't be claimed/slept in by villagers.
Enable waxing bells. Waxed bells aren't recognized as a gathering spot by villagers.
Enable waxing lodestones. Waxed lodestones can't be found by compasses bound to them.
Enable waxing beehives and bee nests. Waxed beehives can't be used by bees.
Enable waxing lightning rods. Waxed lightning rods don't attract lightnings.

Enable waxing nether portal blocks. Waxed nether portal blocks seem to disable chunk loading and also can't be recognized by other portals when linking. Potentially game-breaking, proceed with mild caution.
Enable waxing other modded POIs that do not fall under any previous categories. Potentially game-breaking, proceed with mild caution.
waxed_workstations.midnightconfig.waxing: How much durability (if possible) or items will be consumed when waxing.
waxed_workstations.midnightconfig.unwaxi: How much durability (if possible) or items will be consumed when unwaxing.
waxed_workstations.midnightconfig.waxing: Items that can be used to wax POIs. To add an item tag, enter 'tag ' before the tag itself.
waxed_workstations.midnightconfig.unwaxi: Items that can be used to unwax POIs. To add an item tag, enter 'tag ' before the tag itself.
